item.description:
131 West Shore Road, Ellington, CT!

So many people asked me if I was going to repeat my July 4th party this year, but I just wasn't able to do it.

But the lake is beautiful and I got my dock (somewhat) repaired, AND, I'm turning 50 on August 27th!


And, for gawd's sake, someone remember to bring CAKE.



There's a running joke among my friends that because, like Carrie on Sex in the City, I've never had a wedding shower or a baby shower, I should "register" for my 50th. I'm considering it...watch my website, www.toniandrews.com, for updates on that front. But one thing I know I DO want on my list is a big, honkin' birthday party.

Bring your bathing suit as there will be swimming.

I will provide the grill, ice, paper plates, cups, napkins and utensils.

YOU bring all of the food and drink (and booze).

Also appreciated are lawn chairs, canopies, umbrellas, coolers, etc.

If anyone wants to come over early and set up (because it's my birthday and therefore I should do little more than sit on a throne and supervise) please do so.

And, if someone wants to pick up some fireworks for those of us still hanging out after dark, I wouldn't object...

Street parking on West Shore Road is, as you will remember, tight, but you can also park on Route 30 -- a set of stairs runs down to the lower road -- or at Crystal Lake Self Storage, which is about 1/4 mile away. You can unload first and then take your car up there.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Toni Celebrates the Second Half of Her Life!
